rows.label: tlk43400541_06_msg0001
rows.name:
It's just as I thought... We're
not going to get much further
without outside help...

rows.label: tlk43400541_06_msg0002
rows.name:
Invidia prospers from its Folta
production, as I'm sure you know.

rows.label: tlk43400541_06_msg0003
rows.name:
That's why we're ploughing on with
our Folta research, night and day.

rows.label: tlk43400541_06_msg0004
rows.name:
But recently we've been
making poor progress and
have ground to a halt.

rows.label: tlk43400541_06_msg0005
tlk43400541_06_msg0006
rows.name:
If you find anyone suitable,
could you send them our way?
